name: Sacred S´acha
description:
Mateo is a little kid that was just walking through the forest when suddenly a native fairy appeared and begged for their help! Some malevolent creatures like fire-y things, angry fungus and evil weeds are killing the sacred tree, and you need to repair it before it is too late!

Credits: 

antonella di paolo: background graphics design. digitization. photo edition

albert foster: concept art,  graphics and introductory illustration story,  musicalization 

ramiro rios: game desing, programation
